understanding.title: Understanding Personality Explorer
understanding.content: Congratulations on taking the first step for personalized Career Planning & Assessment! We understand the significance of making informed decisions as you navigate your academic journey and future career. We are committed to empowering individuals with the tools and insights needed to confidently navigate the world of careers and education. To understand your personality Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) test was used, it is a personality explorer psychometric assessment tool that helps individuals understand their preferences, strengths, and areas for growth. Developed by Isabel Briggs Myers and Katharine Cook Briggs, the MBTI categorizes individuals into 16 personality types based on four dichotomies. The goal is to gain deeper self-awareness, enhance personal development, and improve interpersonal relationships.

dichotomies.leftDesc: Energized by social interactions and external activities
dichotomies.rightDesc: Energized by solitary activities and internal reflection

dichotomies.leftDesc: Focuses on concrete, tangible information and present realities
dichotomies.rightDesc: Focuses on abstract, conceptual information and future possibilities

dichotomies.leftDesc: Decisions based on logic and objective analysis
dichotomies.rightDesc: Decisions based on values and subjective evaluation

dichotomies.leftDesc: Prefers structured, organized approaches and planning
dichotomies.rightDesc: Prefers flexible, spontaneous approaches and adaptability
